articles.author: Anand Krishnamoorthy, Winnie Hsu, Carmeli Argana
articles.title: Asian Stocks to Fall as Tech-Led Drop Gains Pace: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: A slump in technology stocks snowballed into Asia as mounting anxiety over frothy valuations and massive artificial intelligence spending drove investors to trim exposure.
articles.content:
